Html: I'm really not sure where to post this, so I thought i'd try here.  Lately there has been a rash of in-game advertisements for Rawr happening on my server (Silver Hand - US), and i'm curious if these are official from someone here or some form of evil keylogging spam that I should be reporting.  Thanks, hopefully.

I think Jothay was doing something like this on his server. Regardless, if they're linking here, it's not a keylogger, but rather someone trying to help people out. If they're linking anywhere other than http://rawr.codeplex.com/ or http://www.codeplex.com/Rawr/, it's not safe.
That actually is me posting in Trade and I'm linking directly to here.

The most immediate responses are "Oh look another Gold Farmer, Ni Hao!" or crap like that. But sometimes I see people then reply to those persons and go like "ZOMG Rawr is awesome, they're not gold farmers!". I love it when they do that.
